snippet.title: FAITH: Chapter III Teaser Trailer (September 21st)
snippet.description:
Wishlist ✞ THE UNHOLY TRINITY ✞ and play the demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1179080/FAITH_The_Unholy_Trinity/

✞ FAITH: Chapter III ✞ is a pixel horror game inspired by the era of classic 8-bit gaming and the "Satanic Scare" of the 1980s. Aided by a mysterious stranger, a young priest travels the dark countryside to stop a Satanic cult from summoning a horrifically powerful demon.

COMING SOON™️

Join the New Blood Interactive Discord: https://discord.com/invite/newblood

BUY FAITH SWAG
https://society6.com/airdorf
https://newblood.games/store

✞✞✞
